description: The bin was not presented on the street.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – they weren't left out for us to empty.

description: There was a problem with the bin as presented.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we didn't empty your bins – they were the wrong bins for this week's recycling collection.

description: The container was too heavy to empty.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – the contents were too heavy.
synonyms: Overweight Bin / Bin too heavy (unsafe to lift)

description: There is too much waste to collect.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – there was too much waste for us to collect.

description: The container was too full, the lid would not close properly.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we didn't empty your bins – they were too full so the lid wouldn't close properly.

description: Extra refuse was present at the side of the bins.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we didn't empty your bins – there was extra rubbish left by the side of your bins. [INFO: Find out how to avoid bin contamination here]
synonyms: Sidewaste / Side waste (bin emptied but side waste left)

description: The contents was contaminated.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we didn't empty your bins – the contents were contaminated. [INFO: Find out how to avoid bin contamination here]

description: It was not possible to access the bins.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – it wasn't possible to access your bin store.

description: A bin was damaged.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – your bin was damaged.
synonyms: Bin damaged / Damaged bin (unsafe to lift)

description: Damaged lid.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – the lid of your bin was damaged. Don't worry, we'll replace it soon.

description: Damaged wheels.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – the wheels of your bin are damaged. Don't worry, we'll replace it soon.

description: Damaged body.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – the body of your bin was damaged. Don't worry, we'll replace it soon.

description: Too many bins are at property.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – there were too many bins on your property.

description: Bin is associated with a different council.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we didn't empty your bins – your bin is from a different council. If this sounds wrong, contact us immediately.

description: A bin was lost inside the vehicle.
ui string: Missing bin: 23 November. Sorry your bin is missing – it was lost inside our vehicle. Don't worry – we'll replace it soon.

description: The property was not on the service.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we didn't empty your bins – your property is not currently in our records. If this sounds wrong, contact us immediately.

description: The containers are in the wrong location, a dog made access difficult, etc.
ui string:
Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – there was a risk of injury because the containers were in the wrong location.
Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – there was a risk of injury because a dog blocked our access.

description: All properties on this street have been visited.
ui string: Emptied: 23 November. We emptied all the bins in your street.

description: A street cannot be accessed due to vehicles blocking access.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – a vehicle blocked our access.

description: Roadworks are blocking the street.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – roadworks blocked our access.

description: A street cannot be accessed due to a gate being locked.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – a locked gate blocked our access.

description: A vehicle alarm was activated.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – a vehicle alarm was activated.

description: The waste collection truck broke down.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – our truck broke down.

description: The road was closed.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – a road was closed which blocked our access.

description: The road could not be accessed.
ui string: Not emptied: 23 November. Sorry we couldn't empty your bins – we couldn't access your road.
